features.name: TikTok OAuth Authentication
features.description: Primary login method using TikTok OAuth. Users authenticate with their TikTok account to access the application. Redirects to /dashboard on success.

features.name: Spotify OAuth Linking
features.description: Secondary OAuth provider to link Spotify account for music playback. Required for enabling song requests feature. Users connect after logging in with TikTok.

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main application view after authentication. Shows user profile, Spotify connection status, and live session panel. Protected route requiring authentication.

features.name: Live Session Panel
features.description: Component for managing TikTok Live song request sessions. Allows starting/stopping sessions and viewing song queue.

features.name: Song Queue API
features.description: API endpoint for managing song request queue during live sessions.

features.name: Session API
features.description: API endpoint for managing live streaming sessions.

features.name: Terms of Service Page
features.description: Legal page displaying terms of service for the application.

features.name: Privacy Policy Page
features.description: Legal page displaying privacy policy for the application.

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components built with Radix UI primitives and styled with TailwindCSS.
